name: Data Breach
description: Unauthorized access to sensitive data could result in financial loss and reputational damage.

name: Fire Hazard
description: Potential fire hazard due to faulty electrical wiring and flammable materials.

name: Power Outage
description: Power outage could disrupt operations and lead to financial losses.

name: Employee Error
description: Human error could result in data loss or security breaches.

name: Equipment Failure
description: Equipment failure could lead to production delays and financial losses.
